channel.title: Comments on: Kuri’s Big Adventure in Austin!
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: Some of us here refer to Kuri as a "he", while others refer to Kuri as "she". That's why on our site you'll see it swap from time to time. So take your pick. What do you think?
item.content:encoded:
Some of us here refer to Kuri as a “he”, while others refer to Kuri as “she”. That’s why on our site you’ll see it swap from time to time.
So take your pick. What do you think?

item.title: By: KittyKat
item.dc:creator: KittyKat
item.description: Is Kuri designed as a female robot for female customers? The look and feel of this mailing seems to suggest that.
item.content:encoded:
Is Kuri designed as a female robot for female customers?
The look and feel of this mailing seems to suggest that.

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: We'll have more events throughout the year, so hopefully we can connect you with some swag at one of our next events!
item.content:encoded: We’ll have more events throughout the year, so hopefully we can connect you with some swag at one of our next events!

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: not yet, we're still focused on the USA to start, and we'll be growing from there. Stay tuned!
item.content:encoded: not yet, we’re still focused on the USA to start, and we’ll be growing from there. Stay tuned!

item.title: By: Damo
item.dc:creator: Damo
item.description: Cool to see a bit of video of Kuri in action. Very much looking forward to my pre-order coming to "life" But hey! Where the t-shirts for then rest of us? :) Couldn't make Austin but can provide Kuri t-shirt action shots from down under.
item.content:encoded: Cool to see a bit of video of Kuri in action. Very much looking forward to my pre-order coming to “life” But hey! Where the t-shirts for then rest of us? 🙂 Couldn’t make Austin but can provide Kuri t-shirt action shots from down under.

item.title: By: Alan
item.dc:creator: Alan
item.description: Great and looking forward to hearing about release of Kuri here in the UK. Do you have an agent over here yet?
item.content:encoded: Great and looking forward to hearing about release of Kuri here in the UK. Do you have an agent over here yet?
